ValidationRule.description: If Outage is yes, then none of the Outage fields can be blank
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Vendor_Outage__c , 'Yes'), ISBLANK(Outage_Start_Date_Time__c), ISBLANK(Outage_End_Date_Time__c), ISBLANK(Vendor_Change_Impact__c), ISBLANK(Outage_Location__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Outage = Yes, then all outage fields must be populated.
